.LINK_INDEX_FLAGS_GET() Syntax OutputString as C = .LINK_INDEX_FLAGS_GET() Description The .LINK_INDEX_FLAGS_GET() method returns the options set when linking two tables in a set. Example dim st as P dim tb as P st = set.open("invoice") tb = table.current(2) ? tb.link_index_flags_get() = "DU"
See Also Table Functions and Methods, Set Functions and Methods
